column6: The Community Finder has all the latest information on free companies, linkshells, and member recruitment.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>Visit the website now and search for new allies to join you on your adventures!

A new dimension of sound awaits beyond the horizon. Immerse brings 360 degrees of personalized spatial audio to the world of FINAL FANTASY XIV. Download and try Immerse for free!<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>After installing, please launch the “Immerse Gamepack FINAL FANTASY XIV Edition” standalone application to setup your profile and activate 360 spatial audio.
